data.name: The Void Rains Upon Her Heart - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Before You Buy This!
If you just want the music and don't care that they are 192kbps OGG files, then the songs are already in the game files for The Void Rains Upon Her Heart for free!

However, if you want to further support the developer of this game and you want 320kbps MP3s of every song in the game, then you should buy this!

This OST is still a work in progress that includes every song currently available in the game itself. As new songs are added to the game they will be added here too. If you buy this now then you will get all future songs for free!

The current track list of 20 songs (As of Early Access v2.0):
  • Blank Melody
  • Subterranean Pulse
  • Shambled Paradox
  • Her Adamant Will
  • Mutual Exclusion
  • Defense Mechanism
  • My Heart Is See Through
  • The Void Rains Down Upon You
  • Distant Observer
  • Warning Signs
  • Nihility
  • Willpower
  • Lonely Respite
  • Uneasy Feeling
  • Impending Doom
  • Arrhythmia
  • Little Imperfection
  • Absolute Zero
  • An End
  • New Chapter
